Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.http.annotation

Packages that use org.jgrapes.http.annotation
Package
Description
org.jgrapes.http
Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
org.jgrapes.http.annotation
Adds a special annotation for methods that handle HTTP request events.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.http.annotation used by org.jgrapes.http
    Class
    Description
    RequestHandler
    This annotation marks a method as handler for events.

    This annotation marks a method as handler for events.
